about.title: About SigmaQ
about.intro: We build AI-first tools that help organizations create smarter surveys and assessments, and make confident, data-driven decisions.
about.mission: Empower teams to measure what matters with delightful, secure, and intelligent tools.
about.story: SigmaQ started with a simple idea: measuring skills and feedback shouldn't be hard. Today, we help teams run high-quality assessments at scale.

timeline.text: Founded SigmaQ with a mission to simplify assessments
Scaled to 1M+ responses and customers in 30+ countries

about.ctaSubtitle: Talk to our team to explore your use cases and requirements

contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Tell us about your use case and we'll get back soon.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We care about your privacy and handle your data responsibly.
privacy.data: We collect only necessary data to provide our services.
privacy.security: We use encryption in transit and at rest and follow industry best practices.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using SigmaQ, you agree to the following terms.
terms.use: Use the service lawfully and respect intellectual property rights.
terms.liability: SigmaQ is provided as-is to the extent permitted by law.

blog.subtitle: Insights on surveys, assessments, and learning

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.subtitle: See how teams succeed with SigmaQ

feature1.title: Smart Survey Builder
feature1.description: Create professional surveys with drag-and-drop, AI templates, and smart suggestions. Multiple question types, logic branching, and real-time preview.

feature2.title: Advanced Analytics
feature2.description: Get deep insights with AI summaries, anomaly detection, data visualization, and automated reporting.

feature3.title: AI Assistance
feature3.description: Generate questions and rubrics, translate content, and surface insights automatically with AI.

feature4.title: Custom Branding
feature4.description: Brand your surveys with custom logos, colors, and themes to match your organization's identity.

feature5.title: Multi-Platform Access
feature5.description: Access your surveys anywhere with responsive design that works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile.

feature6.title: Data Security
feature6.description: Enterprise-grade security with data encryption, GDPR compliance, and secure data storage.

productSuite.title: Product Suite
productSuite.subtitle: From surveys to live quizzes, AI-powered end to end

surveys.title: Surveys
surveys.description: Design and distribute surveys with AI-assisted authoring, translation, and quality checks.

assessments.title: Assessments
assessments.description: Evaluate skills with auto-scoring, AI rubric suggestions, and evidence-based feedback.

liveQuiz.title: Live Quiz
liveQuiz.description: Run timed quizzes with AI difficulty tuning and integrity controls for real-time sessions.

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.description: Standardize new-hire journeys with AI skill-gap detection and personalized learning paths.

questionBanks.title: Question Banks
questionBanks.subtitle: AI-tagged, curated libraries to kickstart testing

readyMade.title: Ready-made Libraries
readyMade.description: Use pre-built, AI-tagged banks for common roles, topics, and difficulty levels.

quality.title: Quality & Consistency
quality.description: Validated questions with AI consistency checks ensure reliable evaluation.

fasterHiring.title: Faster Hiring
fasterHiring.description: Reduce time-to-hire with AI-powered screening and fair, explainable scoring.

ai.title: AI Assistance
ai.subtitle: Work smarter with AI-powered authoring and analysis

aiSurvey.title: AI Survey Assistant
aiSurvey.description: Generate questions, translate content, enforce tone and style, and polish copy.

aiCandidateAnalysis.title: AI Candidate Analysis
aiCandidateAnalysis.description: Automatically analyze open-ended responses with themes, sentiment, and red-flag detection.

aiAutomation.title: Automation
aiAutomation.description: Summarize results, propose next actions, and draft stakeholder-ready reports.
